checkSolutionAlreadyInDB(ac, dataType)[source]¶

Check if a solution is already in the database.

Parameters:

  • ac (str) – The analysis centre acronym

  • dataType (str) – The data type of the solution (timeseries or velocity)

Returns:

A list of solution IDs if the solution is already in the database or an empty list otherwise

Return type:

list

getVersionFromSolution(solutionID)[source]¶
handlePreviousSolution(ac, dataType, tsDatatype, velDatatype, version=None)[source]¶

Handle a previous solution, i.e., if a previous solution exists, erase it from the database, along with its associated timeseries files and estimated coordinates.

Parameters:

  • ac (str) – The analysis centre acronym

  • dataType (str) – The data type of the solution (timeseries or velocity)

  • tsDatatype (str) – The timeseries data type

  • velDatatype (str) – The velocity data type

  • version (str) – The release version of the solution

Save the estimated coordinates to a temporary file for bulk upload.

Parameters:

  • posFile (str) – The path to the POS file

  • idSolution (int) – The ID of the solution

  • idTimeseriesFiles (int) – The ID of the time series file

Get the list of hashes changed.

A list containing a boolean for each provider, indicating if their hash was changed (True) or not (False)

list

movePboFileToBucket(pboFile, bucketDir, filetype, version)[source]¶

Move a pbo file to the bucket directory, according to {bucketDir}/TS/{version}/{pboFile}

Parameters:

  • pboFile (str) – The pbo file to move

  • bucketDir (str) – The bucket directory of the correspondent provider

  • fileType (str) – The type of the file (TS or VEL)

  • version (str) – The release number

Parameters:

  • snxFile (str) – The snx file to move

  • publicDir (str) – The public directory of the correspondent provider

  • solutionDir (str) – The solution directory to move

  • publicDir (str) – The public directory of the correspondent provider

  • fileType (str) – The type of the file (TS or VEL)

src.validate module¶

class src.validate.Validator(cfg, conn, cursor)[source]¶

Bases: object

Validate provider files before handling them.

DEFAULT_POS_FILENAME_LENGTH = 13¶
DEFAULT_SNX_FILENAME_LENGTH = 41¶
FILENAME_CONVENTION_ERROR_MSG_POS = 'Please make sure that the filename conforms to the long filename specification of {{XXXX}}{{00}}{{CCC}}.pos, where XXXX00CCC is the Station Long Marker.'¶
FILENAME_CONVENTION_ERROR_MSG_SNX = 'Please make sure that the filename conforms to the long filename specification of {{XXX}}{{v}}OPSSNX_{{yyyy}}{{ddd}}0000_{{pp}}D_{{pp}}D_SOL.SNX.gz, where XXX is the provider abbreviation, and v is the version (0-9), yyyy is the year, ddd is the day of the year, and pp is the sample period (01 for daily, 07 for weekly).'¶
FILENAME_CONVENTION_ERROR_MSG_VEL = 'Please make sure that the filename conforms to the long filename specification of {{XXX}}.{{version}}.{{refframe}}.vel, where XXX is the provider abbreviation, version is the ReleaseVersion and refframe is the reference frame.'¶
FOUND = 200¶
